content: Create comprehensive development roadmap with MVP, Growth, and Enterprise phases
Define monthly execution plan with deliverables and milestones
Specify resource requirements and investment planning
Develop risk mitigation and contingency strategies
Complete Phase 2: Core Trading Components - LiveDataTable, OrderBookTable, TradeHistoryTable, PositionTable, AdvancedOrderEntry, QuickTradeButtons, OrderTemplate
Complete Phase 3: Real-time Charts & Analytics - TradingChart, MarketDepthChart, PerformanceChart, RiskHeatmap, PortfolioAllocation, PnLWaterfall
Complete Phase 4: Agent & Strategy Management - AgentDashboard, StrategyBuilder, BacktestResults, AgentPerformance, StrategyComparison, RiskAnalysis
Complete Phase 5: Advanced Features - NotificationCenter, AdvancedFilters, DataExport, CustomDashboard, APIIntegration, SystemHealth
Complete Phase 6: Multi-Asset Trading - MultiAssetPortfolio, CrossAssetAnalysis, CurrencyConverter, AssetComparison, RegionalMarkets, CommodityTracker
Complete Phase 7: Advanced Risk & Compliance - ComplianceMonitor, RegulatoryReporting, AuditTrail, RiskLimits, StressTestBuilder, ScenarioAnalysis
Complete Phase 8: Enterprise Integration - EnterpriseSSO, MultiTenancy, AuditLogging, PerformanceMetrics, LoadBalancing, SecurityCenter
Stage all new premium components and CLAUDE.md updates
Create comprehensive commit for all 43 premium components
Push all updates to GitHub repository
Check current branch and main branch status
Push merged changes to main branch
